name: color-palette
description: ## features  ------------------------- - Click any block it will change colours - Choose your own colours by clicking on the hex values above and entering your own values ( currently no validation so if you mistype it goes white ) - Space bar to create entire new palette that is supposed to be complimentary/satisfying composition. - Palette is persistent due to localStorage. -  ## TODO: ------------------------- - Be able to swith between decimal rgb values and hex.
